title: XSS on 3rd party service Localtapiola is using

profile.name: LocalTapiola
profile.about: LocalTapiola’s products and services cover non-life, life and pension insurance, as well as investment and saving services.

vulnerability_information:
## Basic report information
**Summary:** Localtapiola is using careers.fi service to job applicants at
http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt

**Description:** XSS on 3rd party (careers.fi) job service which may lead loss of personal data for the localtapiola job applicants.

**Domain:** http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt and https://careers.fi/tapiola/add_application.cgi

## Browsers / Apps Verified In:

  * Chrome

## Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Go to http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt
 2. Click Täytä hakemuslomake
 3. Click Rekisteröidy
 4. Käyttäjätunnus registration:
Käyttäjätunnus: test"><B>test
 Salasana: some
 Vahvista: some
 Rekisteröi
 
5. Login
 käyttäjätunnus: test"><B>test
 salana: some
 
If redirected to application page, click "keskeytä". Next page you see "käyttäjänimi" field upper right corner and bolded effect. Site seem terrible and put´s Localtapiola´s job applicants personal information in to jeopardy. Other Finnish companies use this site with job applications. If publishing this, please consider to cover all necessary company names, links and pictures to protect job applicants privacy as the site might hold more serious vulnerabilities e.g. SQL injections.

## Additional material

  * pic careers.png

## Related reports, best practices

  * Insist proper web application security tests when using 3rd party services
vulnerability_information_html:
Basic report information

Summary: Localtapiola is using careers.fi service to job applicants at
http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt

Description: XSS on 3rd party (careers.fi) job service which may lead loss of personal data for the localtapiola job applicants.

Domain: http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt and https://careers.fi/tapiola/add_application.cgi

Browsers / Apps Verified In:

  • Chrome

Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Go to http://www.lahitapiola.fi/tietoa-lahitapiolasta/toihin-meille/avoimet-tyopaikat/haemme-juuri-nyt

    1. Click Täytä hakemuslomake
    2. Click Rekisteröidy
    3. Käyttäjätunnus registration: Käyttäjätunnus: test"><B>test Salasana: some Vahvista: some Rekisteröi
    4. Login käyttäjätunnus: test"><B>test salana: some

If redirected to application page, click "keskeytä". Next page you see "käyttäjänimi" field upper right corner and bolded effect. Site seem terrible and put´s Localtapiola´s job applicants personal information in to jeopardy. Other Finnish companies use this site with job applications. If publishing this, please consider to cover all necessary company names, links and pictures to protect job applicants privacy as the site might hold more serious vulnerabilities e.g. SQL injections.

Additional material

  • pic careers.png

Related reports, best practices

  • Insist proper web application security tests when using 3rd party services

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. LocalTapiola takes security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this report until we have determined whether this is a bug and what any potential impact (or fix) will be.

This will most likely be closed as informative as we have very small possibilities to affect third party services. But let's see.

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We aim to respond to your report as soon as possible, but due to the complexity of the systems, triaging many times can take a long time. We prioritize issues -  reports containing trivial issues with limited (or no) business impact and badly written reports with insufficient information on how to reproduce the issue receive a lower priority. Please do not request updates for at least 20 days into the process. Once triaged and verified, bounty decisions are made 1-2 times per month.

*Note: if we frequently dismiss your reports, make sure you have read our policy and stay in scope and that you know how to write good reports - https://support.hackerone.com/hc/en-us/articles/211538803-Step-by-Step-How-to-write-a-good-vulnerability-report*

activities.message: We have informed the parties responsible for this service, and we are awaiting confirmation.
activities.markdown_message: We have informed the parties responsible for this service, and we are awaiting confirmation.

activities.message: Could you recheck - this is supposed to be fixed?
activities.markdown_message: Could you recheck - this is supposed to be fixed?

activities.message: Yep. Fixes made and reported bug not valid anymore (as is).
activities.markdown_message: Yep. Fixes made and reported bug not valid anymore (as is).

summaries.content:
##Issue

The reporter found a reflected XSS in a 3rd party service which is tightly integrated into LocalTapiola. 

##Fix

The application was fixed.

##Reasoning

An XSS as such is not a huge issue from a risk perspective, although it poses a small risk for stealing of credentials. The issue at hand was out of scope, but due to the tight integration we decided to escalate he issue to the third party. We would like to thank the guys at careers.fi for fixing the issue promptly and answering emails in the middle of the night. Great stuff.

The issue at hand was out of scope, but due to the tight integration we decided to escalate he issue to the third party. We would like to thank the guys at careers.fi for fixing the issue promptly and answering emails in the middle of the night. Great stuff.
